member.name: M:Cosmos.Kernel.Debug.Debugger.SendPtr(System.Object,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends the pointer of the given object to any connected debugging hosts.

member.name: M:Cosmos.Kernel.Debug.Debugger.SendPtr(System.IntPtr,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends the pointer of the given object to any connected debugging hosts.

member.name: M:Cosmos.Kernel.Debug.Debugger.DoSendNumber(System.UInt32,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a 32-bit unsigned integer to connected debugging hosts.

member.name: M:Cosmos.Kernel.Debug.Debugger.DoSendNumber(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a 32-bit signed integer to connected debugging hosts.

member.name: M:Cosmos.Kernel.Debug.Debugger.DoSendNumber(System.UInt64,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a 64-bit unsigned integer to connected debugging hosts.

member.name: M:Cosmos.Kernel.Debug.Debugger.DoSendNumber(System.Int64,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a 64-bit signed integer to connected debugging hosts.

member.name: M:Cosmos.Kernel.Debug.Debugger.DoSendNumber(System.Single,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a 32-bit floating-point number to connected debugging hosts.

member.name: M:Cosmos.Kernel.Debug.Debugger.DoSendNumber(System.Double,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a 64-bit floating-point number to connected debugging hosts.

member.name: M:Cosmos.Kernel.Debug.Debugger.SendKernelPanic(System.UInt32,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a kernel panic error code to connected debugging hosts.
